dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits forested streams with black waters (Ref. 7050), usually with some current and wood debris (Ref. 56749).

dataObjects.description: Asia:  Thailand and Laos (Ref. 30857) to Indonesia.

dataObjects.title: Homaloptera orthogoniata
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: "Homaloptera orthogoniata." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. 21 Mar 2013, 02:00 UTC. 9 Mar 2015 <http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Homaloptera_orthogoniata&oldid=650025562>.
dataObjects.description:
Homaloptera orthogoniata is a species of ray-finned fish in the genus Homaloptera found in Thailand, Laos and Indonesia.[1]

§References[edit]

  1. ^ Froese, Rainer and Pauly, Daniel, eds. (2014). "Homaloptera orthogoniata" in FishBase. November 2014 version.
